name: RigTorrent
description: The Real Time Oil and Gas Network
overview:
RigTorrent gives companies in the oil and gas business the ability to obtain inadvertent, desired results through cross platform relationships. RigTorrentâ€™s mission is to initiate, serve, and provide a strategic networking platform for extraordinary companies in the energy sector anywhere in the world who are determined to lead with innovation. Headquartered in Austin, Texas. A city full of innovative companies, talent and new ideas that embody the future of technology, RigTorrent has developed The Real Time Oil and Gas Network of tomorrow.

RigTorrent is a comprehensive business platform for all members of the Oil and Gas community and beyond. Itâ€™s a convenient, easy to use network for industry companies from upstream to downstream, financial to field and all the affiliated commercial and social connections in between. RigTorrent puts you in the middle of the industry - locally AND globally. Our built in communication and collaboration methods allow you to conduct business with current contacts and discover new partnerships in real time. Our mission is to be the single source for all your Oil and Gas networking needs, uniting a global community and connecting you to all industry participants quickly and easily. Connecting is just adding a direct link to your NEW and existing relationships. Once youâ€™re connected, you and your business partners can keep your plans in sync with little effort.

The Monkey Board:

No longer just a bulletin board halfway up a drilling rig, this is where companies broadcasts their accomplishments, plans and needs to their network feeds. Updating just means putting your update where your business network can see and act on them, in real time. RigTorrent gives companies an unlimited number of venues and avenues to build specific need networks. All networks can be member specific! No problem.

RigTorrent keeps you current, saves countless hours in catch-up and is fluid 24/7. Put RigTorrent to work for your company and strengthen your connections! To become a Host on the RigTorrent network and build industry awareness and relationships around your company, its products and services please contact our membership group here
